mapper.select: select from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING ORDER by DESC
select case when max() is null then 1 else max()+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING
select * from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where = (select max() from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where <(select from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where MAPPING_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where = (select min() from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where >(select from TB4D_SSO_USER_MAPPING where MAPPING_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
